input.sentences: we brought my father 's remains to the crematorium today .
the cemetery was full of tombstones .
it had many large headstones too .
it was behind our local church .
we got my father an angel statue .
output.sentences: The remains of the Father are at the crematorium.
There are many tombstones placed throughout the cemetery.
There are headstones to mark the deceased as well
The funeral will be held at the local church.
A statue of an angel will be placed at the tomb of the Father.
